Sleek, powerful, and aerodynamic, this 2017 Ford Mustang packs a 310HP Turbo engine and has an iconic style all its own.\\n\\n Equipped with HID headlamps, LED tail lamps with sequential turn signals, and dual exhaust pipes, this beauty turns heads wherever you go.\\n\\n Enjoy comfortable bucket seats and leather-wrapped steering wheel, paired with a deep guttural rumble when you start the engine.\\n Equipped with Ford SYNC and voice-activated technology, pair your smartphone for integration with your apps, and use your voice to control features without taking your eyes off the road.\\n Hot or cold outside? Use remote start to start the engine before you get to the car, the climate control system will adjust the temperature to a comfortable setting before you get to the car.\\n Book it now and get ready to have fun!\\n\\n DESIGNATED TURO POWER HOST - The best of Turo, see reviews on host profile.
